description.name: Aluminium Oxide Abrasive Yellow Disc for Giraffe Sander 225mm Grit 100
description.long_desc:
An exceptionally durable disc with a diameter of 225mm and grit P100 with perforations for dust extraction during sanding. The paper is suitable for sanding various surfaces.


The strong hook and loop fastening ensure secure attachment even during prolonged use.


Technical specifications:



  • Disc diameter: 225mm

  • Grit: P100

  • Quantity in the package: 10 pieces

  • Type: abrasive paper with perforations for oscillating sanders and/or "giraffe" drywall sanders

  • Uniform grain distribution for fast and efficient sanding


Application:



  • Sanding wood

  • Sanding drywall

description.name: Dust cover for grinder 115 and 125mm
description.long_desc:
Dust extraction guard designed for use with angle grinders with a 125mm or 115mm disc diameter. Thanks to the grinder collar adapters and depth adjustment, the guard can be used in various applications, adapting to diverse user requirements.


Dust extraction guards are engineered to minimize dust and contaminants generated during handheld tool operations, especially during grinding, cutting, or surface sanding.


Grinder Collar Adapter Set: The set includes two grinder collar adapters with diameters of 39mm and 45mm, allowing universal fitting of the guard to different types of angle grinders.


Depth Adjustment: The depth adjustment feature enables the tool to be customized for specific tasks. The maximum cutting depth is 30mm.


Plastic Housing: The guard's construction is made of durable plastic, providing a lightweight, corrosion-resistant, and environmentally resilient tool.


Easy Installation: The guard is designed for easy attachment to the tool, allowing for quick setup for work.

description.name: Blow Torch Burner (Piezo Ignition) PROFI
description.long_desc:
Soldering lamp with piezo ignition for 190g Profi cartridges.


It features a large burner with a diameter of 20 mm, allowing for efficient soldering of both soft and hard materials.


Quick and convenient ignition using a button with piezoelectric ignition. This type of ignition is not only efficient but also safe.


Equipped with a stable, ergonomically shaped handle, enabling comfortable and secure one-handed tool handling. This is particularly useful during longer work sessions.

description.name: Heating Torch Single Head 60mm L70cm with 5m hose and reducer
description.long_desc:
Universal gas burner is a versatile tool that finds wide applications in various outdoor tasks. It works perfectly for melting snow, easy snow removal from sidewalks and driveways. Additionally, it is ideal for roof repairs and various wood processing projects.


This burner operates on propane, which means it can be safely used throughout the year. Its ergonomic handle made of synthetic material provides comfort during prolonged use, reducing the risk of slipping or accidentally dropping the device.


With an impressive power of 340,000 BTU, this burner is an excellent choice for heavy-duty tasks. The handle is easy to grip, and the valve can be conveniently squeezed, increasing handling precision. The package also includes a 5-meter hose, providing additional reach. The burner works with standard liquid propane and can be easily attached to cylinders weighing from 2.27 to 18 kg.


Due to its versatility, the gas burner is perfect for burning shrubs and weeds, melting snow and ice, as well as many other applications. It is delivered fully assembled, ready for immediate use.


Product Features



  • Handle - durable synthetic handle remains cool, protecting hands

  • Flame control dial

  • Charging control lever

  • Push-button igniter

  • Large wide nozzle - 60mm

  • Reducer for cylinders included


Technical Specifications:

































Flame temperature (°C): 1850
Burner power (BTU): 340,000
Gas consumption (g/h):4930
Burner diameter (mm) [internal/external]: 57/60mm
Number of burners: 1
Hose length (m): 5
Burner type: wide flame

description.name: Propane / butane reducer with pressure regulation 0.5-4 bar
description.long_desc:
Gas regulator for propane/butane with pressure adjustment in the range of 0.5-4 bar. Thanks to its regulation and careful construction from high-quality materials, the regulator ensures safe and efficient use of gas. Whether you use it to power a gas stove, grill, or burner, this regulator is the ideal solution for you.


Key product features:



  • High-quality construction: Our regulator is made of high-quality brass, ensuring not only a tight connection but also corrosion resistance. This guarantees long-lasting service.

  • Standard connection: The regulator is equipped with a 21.8 x 1.14 LH connector, which fits most gas cylinders. This facilitates installation and allows for easy connection to your gas source.

  • Smooth pressure regulation: Our regulator allows for precise control of gas pressure in the range from 0.5 bar to 4 bar. This allows you to adjust it to your individual needs.


Application:



  • The regulator is ideal for home use, camping, gardening, workshops, and anywhere you need a stable and safe gas source.

  • Compatible with gas cylinders with an M21.8 x 1/14" LH connection.

  • Reduces gas consumption, stabilizes the flame, and ensures user comfort.


Technical specifications:


Material: brass


Inlet connector thread: M21.8 x 1/14" LH


Outlet connector thread: 3/8" LH


Pressure regulation: 0.5-4 bar


Gas type: propane/butane


Intended for: Gas cylinder

description.name: Folding Car Creeper & Seat (930x420x120mm)
description.long_desc:
Our workshop cot with a function of 2-in-1 stool is an ideal solution for everyone who values comfort during workshop or repair tasks.


Main Product Features:


Stool and Cot in One:
Innovative design that allows the use of the cot as a comfortable stool when sitting and as a full-fledged cot in a horizontal position.


Sturdy Construction:
Durable steel frame ensures stability and durability, enabling safe use of the cot in various positions.


Adjustable Backrest Angle:
The ability to adjust the angle of the cot's backrest allows you to customize it to your preferences, increasing comfort during use.


Practical Dimensions:
The dimensions of the cot (930x420x120mm) make it a convenient tool for storage and transport.


Upholstered Seat:
The upholstered seat of the stool adds elegance and ensures comfort even during longer work sessions.

description.name: Safety knife for stretch films and tapes
description.long_desc:
A safety knife for tapes and packaging films is a tool used for precise and safe opening, trimming, or cutting of packing tapes and stretch films used in the packaging process.


Ergonomic Design


The knife is designed with a comfortable grip in mind, facilitating easy handling and minimizing hand fatigue during repeated use.


User Safety


This knife is specifically designed with user safety in mind. Equipped with blade safeguards to minimize the risk of accidental cuts.

User Safety

description.name: Magnetic Welding Ground Clamp 500A
description.long_desc:
A magnetic welding holder grounding is an indispensable tool for every welder. It allows easy and quick connection of the ground wire to the welded material, without the need for clamping or screwing. Thanks to the strong magnet, the holder firmly holds even hard-to-reach or distant edges. The holder has a diameter of 87 mm and a handle length of 120 mm. It is designed for welders with a maximum output of 500 A.

  • Thanks to the strong magnet, the holder firmly holds even hard-to-reach or distant edges.

description.name: Long reach magnetic pick-up tool with quick release 770mm
description.long_desc:
A long magnetic grabber with a magnet release function is an ideal tool for lifting and moving metal objects. Thanks to the long handle, which is 77cm long, you can reach for things from hard-to-reach places, without bending or risking yourself. The magnet release function allows you to easily and quickly detach the object from the grabber, by pulling or releasing the spring. The magnetic grabber is light, durable and easy to use.

Product features:

    • It is a tool for lifting and moving metal objects.
    • It has a long handle 77cm, which allows you to reach for things from hard-to-reach places.
    • It has a magnet release function, which enables you to detach the object from the grabber by pressing a button.
    • It is light, durable and easy to use.

description.name: ABS Magnetic parts tray 148x112mm
description.long_desc:
A round magnetic bowl is an indispensable tool for every workshop. With it, you can easily store and transport small metal elements, such as screws, nuts, washers or sockets. The bowl is made of durable plastic, which protects it from mechanical damage and corrosion. On the bottom of the bowl there is a strong magnet, which keeps the bowl in one place. The magnet is embedded in a rubber coating, which does not scratch the surfaces on which you place the bowl. The bowl has dimensions of 148x112mm and a round shape, which makes it easy to fit into different places.



Product characteristics:



  • Enables storage and transport of small metal elements

  • Made of durable plastic

  • Has a strong magnet embedded in a rubber coating

  • Has dimensions of 148x112mm and a round shape

  • Ensures order and convenience in work

description.long_desc:

description.name: 10pcs tire anti-slip cables
description.long_desc:
Ensure your safety and comfort while driving in difficult winter conditions with self-tightening anti-slip straps.

Product features:

  • Self-tightening anti-slip straps are chains for wheels that improve grip and stability on snow and ice.
  • The straps are made of nylon, which is resistant to low and high temperatures (from -30°C to 80°C).
  • The straps are easy and quick to install and remove, without the need for tools.
  • The set contains 10 pieces of straps that fit most car wheel sizes.
  • The straps are safe and comfortable to use, they do not damage the tires or rims.

description.name: Pickaxe with wooden handle 2.5kg
description.long_desc:
Our pickaxe with a weight of 2.5 kg and a wooden handle is a reliable tool that can handle even the toughest tasks in earthworks, construction, or gardening.


Main Product Features:


Weight 2.5 kg:
The optimal weight of the pickaxe allows for effective and efficient work without overburdening the user.


Wooden Handle:
The handle made of solid wood provides a comfortable grip, excellent shock absorption, and natural thermal insulation. Wood also guarantees the durability and aesthetic appearance of the tool.


Solid Construction:
The solid steel head with a well-balanced shape ensures effective piercing and crushing of soil or stones.


Universal Application:
Excellent for earthworks, digging, crushing stones, and also useful in the garden or construction work.


Ergonomic Design:
The balanced shape of the tool and the ergonomic handle provide comfort during work and reduce user fatigue.

description.name: Two-hand grease gun for cartridges 413bar
description.long_desc:
Our grease gun is a reliable tool for professionals who value efficiency and durability. Designed for intensive use, the two-handed grease gun enables precise and even distribution of grease in hard-to-reach places.




  • High pressure: With a maximum pressure of 413 bar, our grease gun ensures intense and effective lubrication, guaranteeing optimal protection for machinery and tools.




  • Ergonomic handle: The two-handed handle increases user comfort and allows precise control during grease application.




  • Versatility: The grease gun is compatible with cartridges, facilitating the use of various types of greases, adapting to the specific requirements of each task.




  • Durability and solidity: The solid construction ensures long-lasting performance, even in conditions of intensive use.




Technical specifications:



  • Material: Hard sheet metal

  • Two handles with plastic grips, increasing comfort and precision during use

  • Maximum pressure: 413 bar

  • Thread: M10

description.name: Wheel weight balancing pliers
description.long_desc:
Wheel weight pliers for removing and installing vehicle hub counterweight. The main task of these pliers is to enable the operator to precisely place weights on the rims of wheels. These weights are used for wheel balancing, influencing driving comfort, tire durability, and even wear.


Applications of the pliers:



  • Fitting weights on steel and aluminum rims using a hammer.

  • Removing weights from steel and aluminum rims.

  • Pressing clip-on weights onto fitted weights.

  • Cutting adhesive weights for aluminum rims using a notched cutter located in the handle of the pliers.

description.name: Silicone soldering mat 350x220mm
description.long_desc:
Silicone service mat for soldering with dimensions 350 mm x 220 mm is a solution for everyone who deals with electronics, DIY or equipment repair. This mat provides you not only with comfort and safety during work, but also with order and organization on your countertop. Made of high-quality silicone, which withstands temperatures up to 500°C. You don’t have to worry about damaging the mat or the countertop by hot glue or other heat sources. It has many practical compartments and grooves that will help you sort and store small items, tools, wires, screws and other accessories. At the bottom of the mat there is a place for a ruler with a centimeter scale of 28 cm in length. It works perfectly with a soldering iron or a hot glue gun.

Product characteristics:

  • Material: Made of a special type of silicone, which makes it resistant to heat.
  • Compartments: It has a number of different types of compartments, including open, closed.
  • Work organization: It helps in efficient work organization and minimizes the problem of lost parts.
  • Anti-slip: Thanks to this, you don’t have to worry that the mat will slip during work.
  • Ease of cleaning and storage: Silicone finish makes it easy to keep clean, and after work you can roll up the mat.
  • Temperature resistance: It withstands temperatures up to 500°C, which is excellent for soldering electronic components.
  • Tool compartments: At the top of the mat there are grooves that allow for proper organization of screwdrivers, knives, scalpels and glues.
  • Ruler: The bottom part of the mat has a ruler with a centimeter scale of 28 cm in length, facilitating precise measurement of elements.
  • Side compartments: They are perfect for organizing screws, wires or currently used parts.
  • Magnetic compartments: Three marked compartments have a built-in magnet, which keeps metal elements in place.

Product application:

  • The mat is ideal for working with a soldering iron. Its resistance to temperatures up to 500°C allows you to safely solder electronic components, and the compartments help you organize small parts.
  • The silicone mat also works well when using a hot glue gun. Thanks to the anti-slip surface, you don’t have to worry that the mat will move during gluing.
  • The mat has various types of compartments - open, closed. This allows for efficient organization of tools, screws, wires and other parts.
  • It protects the countertop from scratches and damage during work. You don’t have to worry that tools or mechanical parts will damage the surface.
  • The bottom part of the mat contains a ruler with a centimeter scale of 28 cm in length. This is a useful tool for precise measurements.
  • The top part of the mat has grooves where you can place screwdrivers, knives, scalpels or glues. Additionally, there are closed organizers of different sizes.

  • Ruler: The bottom part of the mat has a ruler with a centimeter scale of 28 cm in length, facilitating precise measurement of elements.
  • Side compartments: They are perfect for organizing screws, wires or currently used parts.
  • Magnetic compartments: Three marked compartments have a built-in magnet, which keeps metal elements in place.

Product application:

  • The mat is ideal for working with a soldering iron. Its resistance to temperatures up to 500°C allows you to safely solder electronic components, and the compartments help you organize small parts.
  • The silicone mat also works well when using a hot glue gun. Thanks to the anti-slip surface, you don’t have to worry that the mat will move during gluing.
  • The mat has various types of compartments - open, closed. This allows for efficient organization of tools, screws, wires and other parts.
  • It protects the countertop from scratches and damage during work. You don’t have to worry that tools or mechanical parts will damage the surface.
  • The bottom part of the mat contains a ruler with a centimeter scale of 28 cm in length. This is a useful tool for precise measurements.
  • The top part of the mat has grooves where you can place screwdrivers, knives, scalpels or glues. Additionally, there are closed organizers of different sizes.

description.name: Carpenter/masonry pencil + 6 refills
description.long_desc:
A construction pencil equipped with an automatically retractable graphite insert. It is perfect for marking various types of building materials during carpentry, renovation, and construction works, etc. Equipped with a clip for attachment. The pencil comes with 6 inserts, one mounted and five in a special container.


Product characteristics:



  • Automatically retractable graphite insert

  • Body made of high-quality plastic

  • Includes interchangeable inserts: 1 mounted + 5 additional

  • Ideal for marking and tracing lines on materials such as: boards, plywood, wood-like materials, and many other building materials.
